parameters.description: Enter the value of the field
parameters.name: member

version.description: The version number of the threat analytics module set.

comment.description: The comment for the Threat Protection profile.

name.description: The name of the Threat Protection profile.

events_per_second_per_rule.description: The number of events logged per second per rule.

current_ruleset.description: The current Threat Protection profile ruleset.

source_profile.description: The source profile. It can be used only during the create operation for cloning a profile from an existing profile.

disable_multiple_dns_tcp_request.description: Determines if multiple BIND responses via TCP connection are disabled.

members.description: The list of members that are associated with the profile.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

source_member.description: The source member. It can be used only during the create operation for cloning a profile from an existing member.

ruleset.description: The version of the ruleset the category assigned to.

is_factory_reset_enabled.description: Determines if factory reset is enabled for this rule category.

name.description: The name of the rule category.

profile.description: The name of the Threat protection profile.

disable.description: Determines if the rule is enabled or not for the profile.

category.description: The rule category this template assigned to.

description.description: The description of the rule template.

allowed_actions.description: The list of allowed actions of rhe rule template.

ruleset.description: The version of the ruleset the template assigned to.

default_config.description: The rule config of this template.

name.description: The name of the rule template.

force_refresh.description: Force a refresh if at least one RPZ is configured.

enable.description: Determines whether the Threat Insight in Cloud Client is enabled.

blacklist_rpz_list.description: The RPZs to which you apply newly detected domains through the Infoblox Threat Insight Cloud Client.

interval.description: The time interval (in seconds) for requesting newly detected domains by the Infoblox Threat Insight Cloud Client and applying them to the list of configured RPZs.

member.description: The name of the Threat protection member.

disable.description: Determines if the rule is enabled or not for the member.

comment.description: The human readable comment for the ruleset.

add_type.description: Determines the way the ruleset was added.

is_factory_reset_enabled.description: Determines if factory reset is enabled for this ruleset.

do_not_delete.description: Determines if the ruleset will not be deleted during upgrade.

added_time.description: The time when the ruleset was added.

category.description: The rule category the custom rule assigned to.

comment.description: The human readable comment for the custom rule.

description.description: The description of the custom rule.

type.description: The type of the custom rule.

allowed_actions.description: The list of allowed actions of the custom rule.

is_factory_reset_enabled.description: Determines if factory reset is enabled for the custom rule.

disabled.description: Determines if the custom rule is disabled.

ruleset.description: The version of the ruleset the custom rule assigned to.

template.description: The threat protection rule template used to create this rule.

config.description: The rule config of the template.

name.description: The name of the rule custom rule concatenated with its rule config parameters.

member.description: The Grid member name to get threat protection statistics. If nothing is specified then event statistics is returned for the Grid.

stat_infos.description: The list of event statistical information for the Grid or particular members.

comment.description: The descriptive comment for the threat analytics whitelist.

disable.description: Determines whether the threat analytics whitelist is disabled.

type.description: The type of the threat analytics whitelist.

fqdn.description: The FQDN of the threat analytics whitelist.
